column4: Hey i just got my old P1 to work the problem is would ubuntu work on a pentium 1 (100mhz), 16mbram, 1gb Hdd ?
Hey i just got my old P1 to work the problem is would ubuntu work on a pentium 1 (100mhz), 16mbram, 1gb Hdd ?
id say most likely yes, but you will not be able to get compiz or any effects running.
im running ubuntu now with compiz and im using about 256mb of ram
